      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializer for modify Customer screen, loads in Combo Boxes with existing values from database and prepopulates all ComboBoxes and TextBoxes with existing values associated with the Customer Instance to be modified
      void keepStates()
      Maintains the ComboBox of States so that the preexisting Country's associated States are loaded in during initialization to avoid conflicting State and Country values or leaving ComboBox empty
      void onModifyCustomerCancelButtonAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Closes the Modify Customer view and calls a method to return to the MainForm view
      void onModifyCustomerCountryComboAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Upon the User updating the Country selection ComboBox, will retrieve the ID value of that Country from the SQL database
      void onModifyCustomerSaveButtonAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Reaction to User pressing Save button, attempts to validate all User input Customer detail values and save them into both the current ObservableList of all Customers and into the connected SQL database on top of the existing entries, overwriting them
      void populateCountry()
      Populates the Country ComboBox from SQL database for User selection
      void populateStates​(java.lang.String Country_ID)
      Populates the first division State/Province ComboBox from SQL database for User selection based upon all divisions associated with the selected Country_ID value of the option selected in the Country ComboBox
      private void returnToMainScreen​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      When called, loads in MainForm.fxml as the current User-facing scene

                                        throws java.sql.SQLException

        java.sql.SQLException - thrown in case of SQL database interaction issues

      • keepStates

        public void keepStates()
                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Maintains the ComboBox of States so that the preexisting Country's associated States are loaded in during initialization to avoid conflicting State and Country values or leaving ComboBox empty
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown in case of SQL database interaction issues

      • populateStates

        public void populateStates​(java.lang.String Country_ID)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Populates the first division State/Province ComboBox from SQL database for User selection based upon all divisions associated with the selected Country_ID value of the option selected in the Country ComboBox
        Parameters:
        Country_ID - the integer matching the selected Country ComboBox option's Country_ID within the SQL Database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown in case of SQL database interaction issues

      • onModifyCustomerSaveButtonAction

        public void onModifyCustomerSaveButtonAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Reaction to User pressing Save button, attempts to validate all User input Customer detail values and save them into both the current ObservableList of all Customers and into the connected SQL database on top of the existing entries, overwriting them

        Lambda exceptionLambda improved code by removing the need to incorporate individual try and catch blocks for every single User entered String, ComboBox, or Date and Time value. Instead, every value may be placed into an all encompassing try block and the Lambda function can handle every validity check and error message display at once exceptionLambda: Lines 218 through 224

        Parameters:
        actionEvent - User initiating button press
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown in case of SQL database interaction issues
